project.projectDescription: This set of data describes a group of students with their gender, group number, parentsâ€™ education level, test preparation and their score in math, reading and writing. It basically shows and lists all the possible explanatory variables that influence all scores.

project.researchQuestion: Are the students that are good at math will be also good at reading? Is there any linear regression between them?
project.conclusion: Since the Beta1 is 0.78723 which in close to 1(meaning that the score of math and the score of reading have a strong relationship), and also according to the graph, we could conclude that there is a linear regression relation between math.score and reading.score. When the score of math increase, the score of reading is also increasing.
